h1.style: font-size: 91px; font-weight: 500; font-family: Poppins, Arial; line-height: 101px; letter-spacing: -3px; margin: 0

p.style: font-size: 18px; font-weight: 400; font-family: Poppins, Arial; line-height: 30px;max-width: 570px;margin: 40px 0 50px 0;

div.p: Errors can occur for many reasons such as a missing file or website unavailability. The reason for this particular error will be reviewed to help prevent a recurrence. Thank you for your understanding.
